bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Limits or conditions on services and restricted activities
bcl:section.bcl:text: A registrant may sell a drug only if

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: standards, limits or conditions have been established, under section 19 (1) (k) or (l) of the Act, respecting the selling of drugs by registrants, and
